document_data.name: Create Crossroads and Backroad
document_data.mainbody: '''''Create crossroads and backroad''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[druid]]s.
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell created two crossroads and a backroad to connect them. For the spell to be cast successfully, the caster had to have visited the end locations at the end of each crossroad. Additionally, the spell summoned a [[crossroad guardian]]. During casting, the spell required the caster's full attention and dedication for a day.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[divine focus]].
